'''Brightwood Fabric Box Platform''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Brightwood Fabric Box Platform is obtainable from [[Menakeri's Treasure Shop]] for 5 [[Dendro Sigil]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=30}}.
